name: 3D Super Block Kart - Blocky Pixel Go-Kart Road Racing Game Pro
name_original: 3D Super Block Kart - Blocky Pixel Go-Kart Road Racing Game Pro
description:
Pick your character and rev up your engines, it’s time for the craziest, wackiest, blockyist go-kart game yet. Race through 4 different worlds and try to be first. Grab power-ups to shoot missiles, zap enemies and trick your opponents.

Featuring:

- 4 Massive track worlds
- 13 Characters
- 13 Karts
- Cool Power-Ups
- Realistic physics
- Much, much, more
